Cell.Data: You picked a book. Open your inventory (I) to read it (Right Click).
You have picked up a skill book. Open your inventory (I) to read it (Right Click).
Lightning attacks are more powerful in water. Use the (S) key to assign Hands of Power in your Skills Bar.
Lightning attacks are more effective in water. Assign skills to the hotkey bar by opening the skills window (S) and dragging the skill into an empty slot.
Fire and burning effects are less effective in water.
Fire and burning effects are less effective in water.
Using piercing weapon against frozen enemies is very effective.
Using piercing weapon against frozen enemies is very effective.
Press Space to perform a dodge roll
Press Space to perform a dodge roll
Hold down and move the middle mouse button to rotate the camera
Hold down and move the middle mouse button to rotate the camera
Each weapon type has its own attack style.
Each weapon type has its own attack style.
Spending a resource fills up the other. Don't hesitate to mix magic spells and melee moves to take advantage of this feature.
Spending a resource fills up the other. Don't hesitate to mix magic spells and melee moves to take advantage of this feature.
Where are the women ? So weird…
Something is missing here ... Where are all the women?
I need to get out of this cursed place.
I need to get out of this cursed place.
Maybe the rebels can offer me their help.
Maybe the rebels can offer me their help.
The way is blocked. I need find another way out.
Over here ! We were looking for you when a savage creature wounded me.
You there! We were looking for you when I got attacked by one of those foul creatures.
It disappeard when I struck it with my blade. Help me up, we have to join my Brothers.
It fled when I struck it with my blade. Help me up, we have to get to the others.
Wait... I sense a powerful dark spell being cast upon us. Get ready, it's a trap !
Wait! I am sensing a dark and powerful spell. Get ready, It 's a trap!
My Brothers are coming soon, you have to hold on !
My Brothers are coming soon, you have to hold on !
Thanks Amon we arrived in time.
Thank Amon we arrived when we did.
Where did those foul creatures come from ?
Where did those foul creatures come from ?
These monstrosities are the fruit of the Usurper's work, and I guess they were going to run the same experiments on you.
These monstrosities are the fruit of the Usurper's work. We believe they were going to run the same experiments on you.
Is that because of these strange powers I have ? Do you know what is happening to me ?
Is that why I posess these strange powers? What is happening to me?
Brother Noctis, give a hand to Brother Leon. We go back to Amarth, I'll explain everything there.
Brother Noctis, please help Brother Leon while we retreat to Amarth. I will explain everything there.

Weapon and Shield uses defense as a mean of offense. Attacking with your weapon increases the amount of damage reflected to the enemies, and blocking with your shield will increase armor vs. hits form the front.

Weapon and Shield uses defense as a mean of offense. Attacking with your weapon increases the amount of damage reflected to the enemies, and blocking with your shield will increase armor vs. hits form the front.

Wield lighter one-handed weapons with all your strength to deliver swift and powerfull blows. You get increased attack damage while holding a single weapon, and get to equip any skill in your free-hand slot.

Wield lighter one-handed weapons with all your strength to deliver swift and powerfull blows. You get increased attack damage while holding a single weapon, and get to equip any skill in your free-hand slot.
Great Swords require more finesse than other two-handed weapons. Slash at your enemies and finish on a thrusting hit. Charge-up a powerful thrust-attack that will pierce multiple enemies in its path.
Great Swords require more finesse than other two-handed weapons. Slash at your enemies and finish on a thrusting hit. Charge-up a powerful thrust-attack that will pierce multiple enemies in its path.
Great Hammers blows have a chance to stun and send your enemies flying away. The third hit always stuns a single enemy. Charge-up to expulse everyone around you with massive damage.
Great Hammers blows have a chance to stun and send your enemies flying away. The third hit always stuns a single enemy. Charge-up to expulse everyone around you with massive damage.

Dual Daggers is a lightning-fast style that exploits the weaknesses of foes. Every stab will increase the amount of bleeding damage you can inflict, while the special attack makes enemies around you bleed for a portion of their current health

Dual Daggers is a lightning-fast style that exploits the weaknesses of foes. Every stab will increase the amount of bleeding damage you can inflict, while the special attack makes enemies around you bleed for a portion of their current health

Take a weapon in each hand to unleash fury upon your foes. Each blow increases your critical damage potential, while the charged attack will inflict a critical hit. You suffer reduced attack damage while dual wielding.

Take a weapon in each hand to unleash fury upon your foes. Each blow increases your critical damage potential, while the charged attack will inflict a critical hit. You suffer reduced attack damage while dual wielding.
Slash away at your foes. Charge your attack to slash the air so hard that a blade is fired at enemies in front of you
Slash away at your foes. Charge your attack to slash the air so hard that a blade is fired at enemies in front of you
Return in town and talk to Father Gernez
Return to town and talk to Father Gernez
I am waiting for you. Follow me now.
I'm waiting for you. Come on, follow me!
Ah, finally! We were looking for you. We heard about your unusual abilities. They must be very helpful, considering you escaped the Republic's Prison.

Ah, finally! We have been searching for you.We've heard interesting things about your unusual magical abilities. It would seem they were not exaggerations, considering you managed to escape the Republic's prison.
Welcome to Amarth. Don't be afraid, we all share magical powers here. It used to be a common thing amongst our people.
Welcome to Amarth. Don't be afraid, we all share an affinity for magic here, something that has been common amongst our people.
We are the templars of Amon, former personal guards of the slayed King.
We are the templars of Amon, former personal guards of the slain King and the royal family.
His Grace was beheaded a long time ago. We failed our king, and Amon's anger is plain to see everywhere since then.
We failed our duty when his Grace was beheaded. Ever since, Amon's fury has been visible everywhere.
Hmm, wait a minute. Something unexpected is going on.
Hmm ... Wait a minute, something is going on …
Father Gernez, we just spotted a burning chariot not far from here.
Father Gernez, we spotted a burning carriage down in the valley.
Strange, it may be another outlaw raid. Go take a look.
Strange. It might be another outlaw raid. Go down the valley and look into this.
And bring our new friend with you, he may prove resourceful.
Bring our new friend with you, he may prove resourceful.
I am here to assist you.
I am here to assist you.
Greetings, Templars of Amon. I came to join the forces of Father Gernez.
Greetings, Templars of Amon. I've traveled here to join the force of Father Gernez.
I am General Luthor, former officer of the Republic. I was approched by Brother Sigmur in the Capitol.
I am General Luthor, previously an officer of the Republic. I was approached by Brother Sigmur in the Capitol.
He knew about my special powers and asked me to join your camp. Rumors say that people like us are tortured and experimented on by several Republic leaders.

He somehow knew about my unusual abilitites and asked me to join your camp before things had a chance of spiraling out of control. It's rumored that some Republic leaders tortured and experimented on those who showed any sort of affinity towards magic.
Listen, I have important information about the curse that spread amongst us. Just help me get my stuff back from the chariot and then we'll talk.

Listen, I have important information about the curse that has been spreading among the population. But first, my carriage was ambushed and overrun on the way to the camp. Please help me retrieve my belongings.
Why are we even doing this ?
Why are we even doing this ?
Thank you so much, these items are very precious to me.
Thank you so much, these items are very precious to me.
Let's go and meet Father Gernez now.
Looks like another mysterious stranger stumbled into our camp.
Father Gernez, Brother Sigmur sent me here for my own protection, and he said maybe I could help you.
Father Gernez, Brother Sigmur sent me here for my own protection. He said maybe I may be able to help you.
He also wanted me to tell you that the curse of Limbo has now affected everyone in the cities except Republic leaders.
Sigmur also asked me to pass on a message. It seems that the curse is now affecting everyone in the cities. Surprisingly, it doesn't seem to affect the rulers of the Republic.
This is what I was afraid of.
This is what I was afraid of.
What are you talking about? Do you know why everybody lost his memory?
What do you mean? You know why everybody is suddenly losing their memory?
Maybe. Neither are we affected by it, nor the Usurper of the throne.
Not exactly, but it seems we are not affected by it, and neither are the people who captured you.
Sigmur also requested me to give you these books. They hold ancient and powerful secrets.
Sigmur also requested me to give you these books. They hold ancient and powerful secrets.
Thanks, I will take a look. Leave me alone for now.
Interesting ... Please excuse me while I take a closer look into this matter.
Oh wait, this is for you.
Oh wait, this is for you.
Good job on this recon my Son, here's a gift for you. You should rest, and come back when you are ready for more action.
Good work on the scouting mission. Please take this as a reward for your efforts. Go, take a rest. Come back to me when you are fully recovered.
Come back when you are ready. In the mean time, you should check our merchant's inventory and grab an armor.
Come back when you are ready. In the mean time, you should check our merchant's inventory and grab an armor.
If you want to test yourself in combat, talk to Torvus on the other side of this place, he may have good challenges for you.
If you want to test yourself in combat, talk to Torvus on the other side of this place, he may have good challenges for you.
Good to see you are willing to help.
Good to see you are willing to help.
We hide here in Amarth, a land of peace lost in a quite brutal world. We built this camp in the ruins of an old fortress, and are shielded by the moutains surrounding it.
We hide here in Amarth, a land of peace lost in a brutal world. We built this camp in the ruins of an old fortress, shielded by the mountains surrounding it.
But even here, you're not safe. You need to know your environment if you want to survive.
But even here, you're not truly safe. You will need to know your environment if you want to survive.
The wild land nearby is quite dangerous, but you can find a lot of useful plants and materials there if you know where to look.
The wild lands nearby are quite dangerous, but you can find a lot of useful plants and materials there, if you know where to look.
Explore the forest and bring me some healing ferns that grow near the river. I will craft you a helpful potion with those.
Explore the forest and bring me some healing ferns that grow along the river side. I will use these to make you a helpful potion.
Great job, Son. These plants are very useful, you should remember it.
Nice work, these plants are very powerful.
Let me mix it with my preparation… And please take this potion as a gift.
I will need some time to prepare the mixture. Here, take this. It should prove useful to you.
Find the river close to Amarth
Find Ferns close to the river
I now have a much harder task for you that no one else can handle at the moment.
I now have a much harder task for you that no one else can handle at the moment.
Undeads are rising everywhere around Amarth, and we need to act before they outnumber us.
The undead are rising everywhere around Amarth. We need to act fast, before they outnumber us.
Brother Leon saw a giant skeleton warrior not far from here, and we cannot allow it to breed more creatures so close from us.
Brother Leon saw a giant skeleton warrior not far from here, and we cannot allow it to breed more creatures so close to the camp.
Find the old ruin in the East and kill that aberration. Be careful though, it won't be alone.
Find the old ruins in the east and kill that abomination. Be careful though, it won't be alone.
Great job, Son. You need to know that the ongoing breeding of undeads around here is the result of dark experiments conducted by sorcerers of the Republic.
You defeated the Overlord? Great work. Meanwhile, we have learned that the hordes of rising undead are the result of dark experiments conducted by sorcerers of the Republic.
For ages, the Usurper has tried to harness the power of shaping existence according to his will. This sacred force is known as Umbra.
For ages, the Usurper has tried to harness the power that would allows him to shape existence according to his will. This sacred force is known as Umbra.
I'm guessing they captured you in order to study your affinity with the Umbra, since you seem to interact with it without knowing its existence.
I'm guessing they captured you in order to study your affinity with the Umbra, since you seem to able to interact with it without knowing its existence.
You should know that Umbra is the power Amon provided us hundreds of years ago, to free ourself from the tyranny of the Devourers, giant creatures feeding from our flesh.
Umbra is the power Amon himself gifted upon us hundreds of years ago, to free ourselves from the tyranny of the Devourers, giant creatures feeding on our flesh.
All templars are taught to understand and manipulate the Umbra, but you shown amazing abilities with it without even noticing. That's… unusual.
All templars are taught to understand and manipulate the Umbra, but you have shown amazing abilities to interact with it without any understanding of it. That's… unusual.
Right now I have work to do, but come back to me soon. It seems that Amon sent you to us at the right time.
I have work to do, but come back to me soon. It seems that Amon has sent you to us at the right time.
You can stay with us if you wish. Talk to the HOUSE MASTER, we may have an empty house for you.
You can stay with us if you wish. Talk to the HOUSE MASTER, we may have an empty house for you.
